+'use client'
+import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'
+import axios from 'axios'
+
+import TForm from '@/components/t_form'
+
+export default function Home() {
+  const totalRef = useRef('')
+
+  useEffect(() => {
+    const connection = new WebSocket('ws://localhost:8000/ws')
+    connection.onmessage = function (e) {
+      console.log(e)
+    }
+
+    return () => {
+      connection.close()
+    }
+  }, [])
+
+  const play = async () => {
+    const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/run_playwright', {
+      total: totalRef.current,
+    })
+    console.log(response.data)
+  }
+
+  const stop = async () => {
+    const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:8000/stop_threads', {})
+    console.log(response.data)
+  }
+
+  return (
+    // <main className="flex min-h-screen flex-col items-center justify-between p-24">
+    <main className="flex min-h-screen flex-col p-24">
+      <TForm></TForm>
+    </main>
+  )
+}
